Package bookstore

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminPanel  
    CustomerPanel  
    DataBaseConnection
    Database Connector class | Provide connection to DB
    DataBaseLogin
    Login check class | confirms if user is registered and can login | also checks if user is administrator
    DataBaseOrder
    Order Class | inserts new order into order table
    DataBaseReduce
    Class designed to | reduce quantity of ordered stock
    DataBaseRegister
    Register Class provides register new user functionality
    Demo
    MAIN CLASS with MAIN METHOD
    MainPanel
    Main panel | Application front/first navigation window |
    TestDBConnection
    Checks Connection
    TestDBStatement
    Checks if Statement parameter is "poolable" | can be used for executing SQL queries
    TestDBTermination
    Test class for connection Termination testing | it sets up connection first and than it terminates it
